org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators

Class JoinOperator.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators.JoinOperator.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    JoinOperator

    public static class JoinOperator.Builder
extends Object
    Builder pattern, straight from Joshua Bloch's Effective Java (2nd Edition).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected JoinOperator.Builder(UserCodeWrapper<JoinFunction> udf)
      Creates a Builder with the provided JoinFunction implementation.

      Creates a Builder with the provided JoinFunction implementation

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JoinOperator build()
      Creates and returns a JoinOperator from using the values given to the builder.

      Sets one or several inputs (union) for input 1.

      Sets the first input.

      Adds additional key field.
      JoinOperator.Builder name(String name)
      Sets the name of this operator.
      JoinOperator.Builder setBroadcastVariable(String name, Operator<Record> input)
      Binds the result produced by a plan rooted at root to a variable used by the UDF wrapped in this operator.
      JoinOperator.Builder setBroadcastVariables(Map<String,Operator<Record>> inputs)
      Binds multiple broadcast variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JoinOperator.Builder

        protected JoinOperator.Builder(UserCodeWrapper<JoinFunction> udf,
                    Class<? extends Key<?>> keyClass,
                    int keyColumn1,
                    int keyColumn2)
        Creates a Builder with the provided JoinFunction implementation
        Parameters:
        udf - The JoinFunction implementation for this Match operator.
        keyClass - The class of the key data type.
        keyColumn1 - The position of the key in the first input's records.
        keyColumn2 - The position of the key in the second input's records.

      • JoinOperator.Builder

        protected JoinOperator.Builder(UserCodeWrapper<JoinFunction> udf)
        Creates a Builder with the provided JoinFunction implementation. This method is intended for special case sub-types only.
        Parameters:
        udf - The JoinFunction implementation for this Match operator.
